--- Soundwave / Frenzy ---

Soundwave looks down at the much smaller bot, replying in his usual 
mostly monotone voice, "Frenzy, eject. Operation Retrieval." As he 
finishes, he turns to look at the other decepticons present, thus 
dismissing his cassettes to complete their operation. On a side 
though, he wonders where Megatron is.

Frenzy leaps out of the slot, and transforms spinning and landing in 
a crouch on the ground. "Rumble, lets go. Maybe we'll get to mash 
some metal along the way." Frenzy stops, "Uhh, so where are we going, 
Soundwave?"

ooc: Kinger, where is you bot?


--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Rumble looked up to Soundwave and sighed, as Spasstik finished 
growling,
> and followed Frenzy, taking a step back, then using the momentum to 
leap
> up and transform, neatly entering Soundwave. Rumble wanted some 
kind of
> action after so many years of imprisonment. He had waited for three
> hundred years, he wasnt looking forward to waiting any longer. He 
took a
> step forward to leap up, and transformed, but stopped, and listened
> carefully. 
> 
> "Soun, Soundwave, you hear that?" he asked cheerfully. "It's someone
> who's looking for some Decepticons. Let me and Frenzy go meet him."
> Rumble said, demanding instead of asking, as he looked up to the 
large
> Decepticon Comunicator.
